channel.title: Judo on Shawn's Docs
channel.description: Recent content in Judo on Shawn's Docs

item.title: White
item.description: Break Fall chin tucked hips low, try not to roll 45 degree arms, never use elbows huge S L A P P Hip Throw (Ogoshi) Set opponent slightly off balance Grab behind with one arm Also reposition with feet to get MAX hip torque Scarf Hold (Kesa Gatame) OTHER arm around neck (compared to side control) other arm constraint opponent wrist and shoulder legs splayed, good to shuffle so doesn’t get trapped head close down and tight to opponent
